details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.9 Form XObjects - 6.2.9.1 Form XObjects
details.description: A form XObject dictionary shall not contain any of the following: - the OPI key; - the Subtype2 key with a value of PS; - the PS key.

rule.description: A form XObject dictionary shall not contain any of the following: - the OPI key; - the Subtype2 key with a value of PS; - the PS key.
rule.test: (Subtype2 == null || Subtype2 != "PS") && containsPS == false && containsOPI == false

error.message: The form XObject dictionary contains a PS key, or a Subtype2 key with value PS, or an OPI key
